about_the_game:
Explore a huge world on a quad! Discover landmarks, people, and much more. Make your own story by either taking a relaxing drive or racing to become number 1.

Features:

  • Full VR Support - Project Quad was made for VR with full visuals and motion controls.
  • A Career Mode - Continuously expanding for the known future with updates for free!
  • A Large World to Explore - Also continuously expanding giving you new places to explore every update.
  • Vehicle Customization - Upgrade your vehicle using a simple monetary system just like early 2000's racing games.
  • Multiplayer - Explore and race your friends online!
  • Updates - Continuous updates for the known future as I intend on creating one of the best VR and racing experiences I have ever known.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Ryzen 2200g/Intel i5 7600k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 570/Nvidia 1060
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus Quest 2/3
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel i5 10600k
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 6800XT
  • VR Support: Oculus Quest 2/3
  • Additional Notes: These are the developer's specs

short_description: Embark on an adrenaline-fueled adventure through diverse terrains on your quad! Whether you're racing towards the pinnacle or leisurely exploring uncharted territories.
